title: Kauai - Sea Point
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Western, Fast food, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Island-inspired quick service franchise eatery with focus on providing healthier food. Menu includes a few vegan choices. Has peanut butter toast, hot oats, smoothies, salads, wraps, and sandwiches.
streetAddress: Regents Rd, Sea Point, Cape Town
